metadata.title: CVE-2019-12474 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Wikimedia MediaWiki 1.23.0 through 1.32.1 has an information leak. Privileged API responses that include whether a recent change has been patrolled may be cached publicly. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and 1.27.6.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.2-1').
